summary: A baby wolf is left on the doorstep of the three little pigs, so they raise him as their own.
cast: Jon Cryer|Brad Garrett|Steve Zahn|Tom Kenny|Jesse McCartney|Timothy McCartney|Steve Wilcox|Nolan North|Chris Elwood|Mark Adair-Rios|Tara Strong|Audrey Wasilewski
keywords: pig|cgi animation|big bad wolf|number in title
director: Directors: Howard E. Baker, Arish Fyzee
title: Unstable Fables: 3 Pigs & a Baby
